articles.title: 'Gold, gold, gold': A look inside Mar-a-Lago - CNN Video
articles.description: New details show the gold-plated interior of Former President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago estate. CNN's Brian Todd reports.

articles.title: Watch: Trump's former AG Barr: No reason for classified docs to be at Mar-a-Lago  - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Attorney General William Barr appeared on Fox News to say there is no "legitimate reason" for classified documents to have been at Mar-a-Lago and cast doubt on the idea that they had somehow been declassified.

articles.author: Matias Grez and Steve Almasy, CNN
articles.title: Serena Williams' legendary tennis career likely over after third-round singles' play loss at US Open
articles.description: Serena Williams' legendary tennis career has likely come to an end after she fell to Australia's Ajla Tomljanović in the third round of the US Open at Arthur Ashe Stadium in Flushing, New York. The 23-time grand slam singles champion leaves an indelible mark,…

articles.author: Jamie Gangel, Kristen Holmes, Jeremy Herb and Evan Perez, CNN
articles.title: After Mar-a-Lago search, Meadows turns over more texts and emails to Archives

articles.title: Revelatory moments from the historic Mar-a-Lago special master hearing

articles.author: Jamiel Lynch, CNN
articles.title: Memphis police are looking for school teacher who was abducted while out for early morning jog
articles.description: Memphis Police are searching for school teacher Eliza 'Liza' Fletcher who they say was abducted while she was out on a jog Friday morning.

articles.author: Tierney Sneed and Katie Bo Lillis, CNN
articles.title: Mar-a-Lago search inventory shows documents marked as classified mixed with clothes, gifts, press clippings
articles.description:
The search inventory released showed that classified documents had been mixed in with personal items and other materials in the boxes in which they were stored.
Federal investigators also retrieved more than 11,000 non-classified government documents.

articles.author: Annie Grayer, CNN
articles.title: McCarthy requests documents and testimony from Garland over Mar-a-Lago search

articles.author: Uliana Pavlova, Anna Cooban
articles.title: Russia cuts off gas exports to Europe via Nord Stream indefinitely
articles.description: Russia won't immediately resume exports of natural gas to Europe through its Nord Stream 1 pipeline, worsening a shortage that threatens to tip the continent into an energy crisis this winter.

articles.author: Opinion by Ted Gup
articles.title: Opinion: What's really at stake when top secrets are stored at Mar-a-Lago?
articles.description: The families of those who died while doing undercover work for the CIA come to mind in reading the reports of former President Donald Trump possibly taking ultra-sensitive classified documents, writes Ted Gup.
articles.content: Ted Gup is the author of "Nation of Secrets: The Threat to Democracy and the American Way of Life" and "The Book of Honor: Covert Lives and Classified Deaths at the CIA." In January, he will be teach… [+9162 chars]
